newsitem.title: USA: Natural MicroSystems licenses Voxware item.
newsitem.headline: Natural MicroSystems licenses Voxware item.

text.p: Natural MicroSystems Corp said Wednesday it licensed Voxware Inc's MetaVoice RT29 voice compression technology.
Terms of the agreement were not disclosed.
Natural MicroSystems said it plans to integrate the Voxware technology with Fusion, a development platform for scaleable, server-based Internet telephony applications.

Voxware develops speech and audio compression technologies for Internet Protocol communications and multimedia solutions. The company's MetaVoice technology aims to reproduce high-quality speech with low bandwidth and processing power.
